4314280.name: Faehnor Online
4314280.description:
NOT AVAILABLE IN ENGLISH YET!Â 

For the moment, the game server is located in France, so countries that are geographically distant may experience higher latency.

Only the following countries are currently open: France, Belgium, Switzerland, Andorra, Monaco, Luxembourg, Spain, Portugal, Italy, Germany, the Netherlands, the United Kingdom, Ireland, Greece, Canada, and the United States.

Please hang tight a little longerâ€¦ :)Â 

FAEHNOR ONLINE IN A FEW WORDS

This game was born from an unreasonable idea: creating a homemade MMORPG, without a big studio or a real budget â€” just stubborn passion and the desire to offer an adventure that truly feels handcrafted.

In this open world, exploration isnâ€™t guided by an omnipresent miniâ€‘map or a magic navigation system. Study paper maps and learn to find your way like a real adventurer.

Getting lost is part of the journey â€” finding your way back always carries a small taste of victory.

âš”ï¸ A WORLD SHAPED FOR REFLEXES

Here, monsters donâ€™t drag their feet: they rush, bite, strike, and never wait for their turn.

Attacks are fast, direct, and without warning. Every encounter forces you to decide in a second â€” dodge, strike, flee.

â€œHesitation is often the worst option.â€

ğŸ§­ A WORLD THAT WILL NEVER HOLD YOUR HAND

Here, nothing blinks to tell you where to go!

No quest markers, no icons above NPCs, no arrow to put you back on the right path. If you get lost, no navigation system will bring you home.

This is a world that lets you search, observe, ask questionsâ€¦ and sometimes wander in circles. But thatâ€™s also what makes every discovery truly yours.

â€œAdventure begins where the arrows end.â€

ğŸŒ¿ A WORLD WHERE YOU FIT INTO NO BOX

Here, your progression follows no prefabricated model. At each level, you alone choose which direction to take.

No imposed class, no predetermined path: only your choices define who you become.

And even if the result sometimes feels a little uneven, thatâ€™s exactly what makes you unique.

â€œShape your strengths and embrace your weaknesses.â€

Otherwise, youâ€™ll find the familiar codes of MMORPGs: combat, quests, crafting, exploration, encountersâ€¦ but with the singular touch of a world shaped by a single pair of hands.

ğŸš§ 3 UPCOMING STEPS

ğŸ¬Intro sequence and opening cinematic

So you no longer drop into the world like youâ€™ve been thrown in at random â€” your arrival deserves at least a bit of flair.

âš”ï¸Combat gameplay improvements â€“ phase 2 (status effects / control / aggro / buffs)

Because itâ€™s time for everyone to do something other than run in circles screaming. [currently testing]

ğŸ”§Switch to UE5

Because at some point, we have to accept itâ€™s time to leave prehistory behind.

â“ FAQ.

What about English?

The English translation is well underway but not fully completed yet. English voiceâ€‘over will only be available at a later stage.

How will the game be financed?

A premium item shop (non payâ€‘toâ€‘win) will be available soon. Youâ€™ll find cosmetic options and other practical items there.

Tell us more about the team.

This MMORPG began in 2019, first developed by two people, before becoming a project fully carried by a single creator since late 2022. The world, the systems, the mechanicsâ€¦ everything has been built patiently, line by line, with occasional help from external artists for certain visual elements.

Â 

Do I need a thirdâ€‘party account to play?

Yes. The game is not yet linked to Steam accounts. Youâ€™ll need to create a separate account on the gameâ€™s official website. Registration only requires minimal information and takes just a few seconds.

Do you use AI?

As of today, no content in the game has been generated using AI.
